name: Arcade Asteroids
description: This is the first 'real' game I've ever made, I'm not an artist or someone with experience. I wanted to train by making this game and I wanted to share it. May add custom music, but I'd rather just go royalty free and add credits. All input welcome, try to keep it constructive if possible. I placed in early access because I want to add more features to make my first game a more complete experience. I will update this game as I learn more or have an itch to add a feature. If it's requested by anyone I will make a full update schedule. Thank you.
